item.description:
10:00 is a good time to meet Deb Sheridan and others. They will be gathering at Stoneforge parking lot next to the the Walmart on RT 44 in Raynham..... We have done it many years now.... Toys or money goes to children that have nothing......
Registration is from 9:30-11:00. Requested Donation of $15.00 ($25.00 for 2 people) or equivalent cost gift per person. Includes meal at VFW, N. Quincy St., Brockton at end of ride. Police escorted 30 mile back road ride. 2,3, or 4 wheelers invited.
Also - wear your vests if you have them. And........... Josey has arrived, so this will be her first group ride with us!
item.name: 26th Annual Blue Knights Toy Run
